definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: Not all products might have the same route through the supply chain.
sentences.chinese: 并非所有产品都沿着相同的路径通过供应链。

sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁炉架摆放了一些绿叶以使边线看起来柔和一点。

sentences.english: Ride the rails along deep river canyons and over high mountain passes.
sentences.chinese: 沿着深河峡谷和高山通行的路轨。

sentences.english: The caryopsis is unusual, as the embryo extends along its whole length.
sentences.chinese: 当胚沿着它的整个长度延长时，颖果是不平常的。

sentences.english: I started walking down an unfamiliar road. There was not a soul there.
sentences.chinese: 我开始沿着一条不熟悉的道路前行，连个人影都没有。

sentences.english: They entered the property and followed the internal road until the entryway of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她们进入了庄园，沿着主干道来到房子的入口通道。

sentences.english: Go down the street till the crossroads and turn left there.
sentences.chinese: 沿着这条路走到十字路口，向左拐。

sentences.english: A child was toddling along the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 一个小孩正沿着人行道蹒跚行走。

sentences.english: You would just walk along that path, and it will get you there without effort.
sentences.chinese: 你只要沿着那条路，它将会指引你到达那里。

sentences.english: Water inched its way up the steps as first as first-floor outside walls collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 当一楼外墙塌陷时水慢慢地沿着台阶漫了上来。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Seret had inched along the car toward Stephen.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，塞里特沿着汽车一点一点地靠近了史蒂芬。

sentences.english: Then their centers have been offset by 25 meters along the X axis.
sentences.chinese: 那么他们的中心是沿着X轴偏移了25米。

sentences.english: Center Street and you will see a beautiful park.
sentences.chinese: 沿着中心街走，你将看到一个漂亮的公园。

sentences.english: Jamie was going to walk along the top of the wall but he chickened out at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 吉米打算沿着墙顶上走，但是在最后时刻他怯退了。

sentences.english: Aftershocks extended along the fault system in both directions.
sentences.chinese: 余震沿着断层系统向两个方向延伸。

sentences.english: Along the roof line there are 10 pointed cupolas.
sentences.chinese: 沿着屋顶线条有10处突出的炮塔。

definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
to detour/to bypass/to circumvent/to avoid/to wind around (of a road etc)
along the way/the duration of a journey
the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
